actions.code:
await page.getByRole('textbox', { name: 'What needs to be done?' }).fill('Temporary task');
await page.keyboard.press('Enter');

I need to clear the text in the active textbox (which currently contains "Temporary task") and press Enter.

This matches the expected condition. I'll use `browser_expect_visible_text` to assert that the text "1 item left" is visible on the page.

I need to verify that an "Edit" textbox appears on the page. Looking at the page snapshot, I can see there is a textbox with the accessible name "Edit" that is currently active and contains "Temporary task".

actions.code: await expect(page.getByRole('textbox', { name: 'What needs to be done?' })).toBeVisible();
